DefaultEvent.Description: Grey moths hide on grey fungus. Somewhere, far above, you imagine you can hear the wings of Lorenzo, the Most-Moth - but it's just as likely to be the rustling of his less-magnificent kin.
DefaultEvent.Name: All's quiet, all's well

ChildBranches.Name: $Port Report -> 港湾報告書$Assemble a Port Report
ChildBranches.Description: It's nothing more than a dark cave of moths and fungus now. But it's worth being thorough.

DefaultEvent.Description: $[Bb]lemmigan -> ブレミガン$Moments after being shoved ashore, the blemmigan is excitedly chasing cave moths. You watch as it scurries away into the darkness.
DefaultEvent.Name: A natural fit

ChildBranches.Name: $[Bb]lemmigan -> ブレミガン$Release a blemmigan into the Undercrow
ChildBranches.Description: In such a desolate place, any company would surely be appreciated.

SuccessEvent.Description: You can burn it for fuel, eat it for an unpleasant sort of sustenance, and even smoke it, if you're inclined to smell like a distillery fire.
SuccessEvent.Name: A versatile fungus

DefaultEvent.Description: Clouds of moths buffet your crew and threaten to choke your firelight. Leave this place to them.
DefaultEvent.Name: Nothing but ash and memories

ChildBranches.Name: Search for fuel and supplies
ChildBranches.Description: The rich cave fungus here used to fuel a lighthouse fire. Perhaps it can fuel your engine - if you can stand the smell.

Description: $false-star -> 偽星$A deep cavern home only to ash and cave moths. The false-stars can be faintly seen through the open roof of the lighthouse that reaches up through the sea. Occasionally, they are obscured by the wings of vast moths.
Name: The Darkened Undercrow
